title: Hayden's Choice
description: Just when Hayden is given a second chance to finish high school and salvage what is left of her adolescence, she meets the wealthy and beautiful William Stanton, an older man who happens to be her uncle. Never good at resisting temptation, Hayden lets him seduce her, only to find out that he isn’t looking for a quick romp between the sheets. He wants a new submissive. Hayden’s Choice is a 10,000+ word story that contains taboo subject matter and sex between consenting adults.
author: Victoria  Kelley
